title: Shadowheart
content:
. Some Companions can be selected as an Origin during Character Creation, allowing players to play from their point of view.

A loyal servant of the goddess Shar, Shadowheart is the sole survivor of a holy mission undertaken at the Mistress of the Night's behest. She alone must deliver a relic of immense power to her coven in Baldur's Gate, while threatened by a strange new magic that is burgeoning from within.
